roleset.name: pleasurably excite
roleset.note: TITILLATE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amuse-31.1. (from titillate.01-v)

example.name: event as cause
example.text: How titillating it [*EXP*-4] was [*T*-3][*] to go among people who [*T*-1] did not know him as the composer , but who [*T*-2] talked in the most glowing terms of the promise of the piece after [*] having heard the first rehearsals .
example.arg: [*] to go among people who [*T*-1]did not know him as the composer , but who [*T*-2] talked in the most glowing terms of the promise of the piece after [*] having heard the first rehearsals

example.name: both args, agentive arg0
example.text: How-1 do you titillate an ocelot *trace*-1?
